product_name: Pace Cinelli RWG Black Bike Cap - Men's
long_description: Express your enthusiasm for Italian racing with the Cinelli RWG Black Bike Cap from Pace. Cotton cap features the name of Italy's internationally renowned Cinelli racing bike company as well as color stripes resembling the Italian flag. Visor helps keep sun and glare out of your eyes when you're off the bike cheering at the races.
short_description: Express your enthusiasm for Italian racing with the Cinelli RWG Black Bike Cap from Pace.
